text: Sonya Jehan is a French-Pakistani Bollywood actress. Jehan's first movie was Taj Mahal: An Eternal Love Story in 2005. Her original name was Sonya Rizvi. She changed it to Jehan to honor her grandmother, Noor Jehan, who is a legendary singer and Lollywood actress. ==References== Category:Punjabi people Category:Pakistani movie actors Category:French actors Category:1980 births Category:Living people
title: Sonya Jehan
